html.questionText: 1) Which of the following tag is used to insert a line-break in HTML?
html.explanation:
The
tag in the HTML document is used to create a line break in a text. If we place the
tag in HTML code, then it works the same as pressing the enter key in a word processor.

html.questionText: 2)Which of the following element is responsible for making the text italic in HTML?
html.explanation: The <i> (italic tag) tag in HTML is used to display the written text in italic format.
The <input> tag in HTML is used to represent a form input control in HTML document.

html.questionText: 4) Which of the following attribute is used to provide a unique name to an element?
html.explanation: The id attribute is used to specify a unique id for an element of the HTML document. It allocates the unique identifier which can be used by the JavaScript and CSS to perform certain tasks.

html.questionText: 5)A program in HTML can be rendered and read by
html.explanation: HTML programs can be read and rendered by the web browser. A web browser can support several web pages.
